### Do Over Macro Vars

<p><pre>
%macro loopThem(loops);
%do i = 1 %to %sysfunc(countw("&loops."));
	%let cur_par = %scan(&loops., &i.) ;
	%do_something_once(cur_par);
%end;
%mend loopThem;

/*Sample Call*/
%loopThem(loops = FASFL RSK1CTB RSK2CTB RSK3CTB);
</pre><p>

More application, see [Tight Looping With Macro Arrays ](https://support.sas.com/resources/papers/proceedings/proceedings/sugi31/040-31.pdf)

### PROC Transpose

<p><pre>
PROC TRANSPOSE data=input out=output;
	by [the combination to identify];
	id [move to column];
	var [column to be transposed to row];
RUN;
proc transpose data=tbl01 out=tbl02;
		by SOC PT;
		var out;
		id GRP; idlabel LBL;
run;
</pre></p>

### PROC Sort

<p><pre>
PROC SORT sortseq=linguistic(Numeric_Collation=ON);
  by vars;
RUN;
</pre></p>

### Customize a Function

<p><pre>
proc fcmp outlib=work.yanfun.project;
function exampleFun(var_char $, var_num) $;
	return("some string");
endsub;
run;
</pre></p>

### Proc Datasets (append)

<p><pre>
PROC DATASETS library=work nolist;
   append base=tmp data=tmp1 force;
   delete tmp1;
RUN;
</pre></p>

This achieves union of two datasets and delete the temp one.
